name: Pepe Dollar
description: $PEPD is your decentralized antidote to fiat foolishness—a revolutionary Layer-2 Payment Infrastructure crafted for the Meme Economy. Pepe Dollar (PEPD) isn’t just a token; it’s a digital satire, a movement, and a financial middle finger to outdated systems. In a world overrun by inflationary fiat, $PEPD empowers creators, fuels culture, and redefines value through decentralized expression. – Pepe Powell
